plot outline: With no real goal in life except for wanting to be rich, three boys set out to make enough money by using various shortcuts. Their aim lands them into a series of interesting yet funny incidents, which they keep falling in and out of, forming the crux of the story.
title: Double Engine
plot: Three boys set out to make enough money by using numerous shortcuts possible which lands them into a series of interesting yet funny incidents.

With no real goal in life except for wanting to be rich, three boys set out to make enough money by using various shortcuts. Their aim lands them into a series of interesting yet funny incidents, which they keep falling in and out of, forming the crux of the story.
